def_en: If you intend to do something, you have decided or planned to do it.

def_cn: 准备,预留(作某种用途或给某人用)
def_en: If something is intended for a particular purpose, it has been planned to fulfil that purpose. If something is intended for a particular person, it has been planned to be used by that person or to affect them in some way.
If you intend a particular idea or feeling in something that you say or do, you want to express it or want it to be understood.
